Verses: 1 manushar Kaanavendumendru Avargalukku Munpaaga Ungal Tharmaththaich Seyyaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Seydhaal Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaavinidaththil Ungalukkup Palanillai.

2 aagaiyaal Nee Tharmanjeyyumpodhu Manusharaal Pukazhappaduvadharku, Maayakkaarar Aalayangalilum Veedhigalilum Seyvadhupola, Unakku Munpaaga Thaarai Oodhuviyaadhe; Avargal Thangal Palanai Adaindhu Theerndhadhendru Meyyaakave Ungalukkuch Sollukiren.
3 neeyo Tharmanjeyyumpodhu, Un Tharmam Andharangamaayiruppadharku, Un Valadhu Kai Seykiradhai Un Idathu Kai Ariyaadhirukkakkadavadhu;
4 appozhudhu Andharangaththil Paarkkira Un Pidhaa Thaame Unakku Veliyarangamaaip Balanalippaar.

5 andriyum Nee Jebampannumpodhu Maayakkaararaip Polirukkavendaam; Manushar Kaanumpadiyaaga Avargal Jeba Aalayangalilum Veedhigalin Sandhigalilum Nindru Jebampanna Virumpugiraarkal; Avargal Thangal Palanai Adainthu Theerndhadhendru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.

6  Neeyo Jebampannumpodhu, Un Araiveettukkul Piravesiththu, Un Kadhavaippootti, Andharangaththilirukkira Un Pidhaavai Nokki Jebampannu; Appozhudhu, Andharangaththil Paarkkira Un Pidhaa Veliyarangamaai Unakkup Balanalippaar.
7 andriyum Neengal Jebampannumpodhu, Agngnaanigalaippola Veen Vaarththaigalai Alappaadheyungal; Avargal, Adhika Vasanippinaal Thangal Jebam Ketkappadumendru Ninaikkiraargal.
8 avargalaippola Neengal Seyyaadhirungal; Ungal Pidhaavai Nokki Neengal Vendikkollugiradharku Munname Ungalukku Innadhu Thevai Endru Avar Arindhirukkiraar.
9 neengal Jebampannavendiya Vidhamaavadhu; Paramandalangalilirukkira Engal Pidhaave, Ummudaiya Naamam Parisuththappaduvadhaaga;
10  Ummudaiya Raajyam Varuvadhaaga; Ummudaiya Siththam Paramandalaththile Seyyappadugiradhupola Boomiyileyum Seyyappatuvadhaaga.
11 engalukku Vendiya Aagaaraththai Indru Engalukkuth Thaarum.
12 engal Kadanaaligalukku Naangal Mannikkiradhupola Engal Kadangalai Engalukku Manniyum.
13  Engalai Sodhanaikkutpadappannaamal, Theemaiyinindru Engalai Ratchiththukkollum, Raajyamum, Vallamaiyum, Magimaiyum Endrendraikkum Ummudaiyavaikale, Aamen, Enpadhe.
14 manusharudaiya Thappidhangalai Neengal Avargalukku Manniththaal, Ungal Paramapidhaa Ungalukkum Mannippaar.
15  Manusharudaiya Thappidhangalai Neengal Avargalukku Manniyaadhirundhaal, Ungal Pidhaa Ungal Thappidhangalaiyum Manniyaadhiruppaar.

16 neengal Ubavaasikkumpodhu, Maayakkaaraippola Mugavaadalaai Iraadheyungal; Avargal Ubavaasikkiradhai Manushar Kaanum Poruttaaga, Thangal Mugangalai Vaadappannugiraargal; Avargal Thangal Balanai Adaindhu Theerndhadhendru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
17 neeyo Ubavaasikkumpodhu, Andha Ubavaasam Manusharkalukkuk Kaanappadaamal, Andharangaththilirukkira Un Pidhaavukke Kaanappadumpadiyaaga, Un Thalaikku Ennei Poosi, Un Mugaththaik Kazhuvu.
18  Appozhudhu, Andharangaththil Paarkkira Un Pidhaa Unakku Veliyarangamaaip Palanalippaar.
19 poomiyile Ungalukkup Pokkishangalaich Serththu Vaikkavendaam; Inge Poochchiyum Thuruvum Avaigalaik Kedukkum; Inge Thirudarum Kannamittuth Thiruduvaargal.
20 paralokaththile Ungal Pokkishangalaich Serththu Vaiyungal; Ange Poochchiyaavadhu Thuruvaavadhu Kedukkiradhum Illai; Ange Thirudar Kannamittuth Thirudugiradhum Illai.
21 ungal Pokkisham Engeyirukkiradho Ange Ungal Irudhayamum Irukkum.
22 kannaanadhu Sareeraththin Vilakkaayirukkiradhu; Un Kan Thelivaayirundhaal, Un Sareeram Muzhuvadhum Velichchamaayirukkum.
23 un Kan Kettadhaayirundhaal, Un Sareeram Muzhuvadhum Irulaayirukkum; Ippadi Unnilulla Velichcham Irulaayirundhaal, Avvirul Evvalavu Adhikamaayirukkum!

24 irandu Ejamaangalukku Oozhiyam Seyya Oruvanaalum Koodaathu; Oruvanaip Pagaiththu Oruvanaich Sinegippaan. Alladhu Oruvanaip Patrikkondu Matravanai Asattaipannuvaan; Dhevanukkum Ulagap Porulukkum Oozhiyanjeyya Ungalaal Koodaathu.

25  Aagaiyaal Ennaththai Unbom, Ennaththaik Kudippom Endru Ungal Jeevanukkaagavum; Ennaththai Uduppom Endru Ungal Sareeraththukkaagavum Kavalaippadaadhirungal Endru, Ungalukkuch Sollukiren; Aagaaraththaip Paarkkilum Jeevanum, Udaiyaippaarkkilum Sareeramum Viseshiththavaigal Allavaa?

26 aagaayaththup Patchigalaik Kavaniththuppaarungal; Avaikal Vidhaikkiradhumillai, Arukkiradhumillai, Kalanjiyangalil Serththuvaikkiradhumillai; Avaigalaiyum Ungal Paramapidhaa Pizhaippoottugiraar; Avaigalaippaarkkilum Neengal Viseshiththavargal Allavaa?
27 kavalaippadugiradhinaale Ungalil Evan Than Sareera Alavodu Oru Muzhaththaik Koottuvaan?
28  Udaikkaakavum Neengal Kavalaippadugiradhenna? Kaattuppushpangal Eppadi Valarugiradhenpadhaik Kavaniththuppaarungal. Avaigal Uzhaikkiradhumillai, Noorkiradhumillai;
29 endraalum Saalomon Mudhalaaith Than Sarva Magimaiyilum Avaigalil Ondraippolaagilum Uduththiyirundhadhillai Endru, Ungalukkuch Sollukiren.
30 arpa Visuvaasigale! Indraikku Irundhu Naalaikku Aduppile Podappadum Kaattup Pullukkuth Dhevan Ivvidhamaaga Uduththuviththaal, Ungalukku Uduththuvippadhu Adhiga Nichchayamallavaa?
31  Aagaiyaal, Ennaththai Unbom, Ennaththaik Kudippom, Ennaththai Uduppom Endru Kavalaippadaadhirungal.
32 ivaigalaiyellaam Agngnaanigal Naadiththedugiraargal; Ivaigalellaam Ungalukku Vendiyavaigal Endru Ungal Paramapidhaa Arindhirukkiraar.
33  Mudhalaavadhu Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaiyum Avarudaiya Needhiyaiyum Thedungal; Appozhudhu Ivaigalellaam Ungalukkuk Koodak Kodukkappadum.
34  Aagaiyaal Naalaikkaagak Kavalaippadaadhirungal; Naalaiyathdhinam Thannudaiyavaigalukkaagak Kavalaippadum. Andhandha Naalukku Adhinadhin Paadu Podhum.
